column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/3dc1464f0a87e26f3aa39c446eb4d102a8c84dc2 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

ACK.

The second commit isn't necessary: there is no allocation associated with vhListenSocket. It can't hurt though.
Good idea to split this up.\n
